forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 29. West wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 46. Northwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As night deepens over Boston, the city dons a cloak of crisp clarity, interrupted only by scattered pockets of warmth emanating from windowed homes. The air carries a refreshing bite, hinting at the enchantment of a late March evening; temperatures hover around 29 degrees, with a brisk west wind brushing past, imparting a promise of vibrancy come dawn. Tomorrow, the sun will rise with intention, casting bright rays that will surely bounce off the remnants of winter’s chill, transforming the landscape into a tapestry of sunlight and shadow.

As you prepare for the day ahead, layers are advisable; a cozy sweater paired with a sturdy jacket will shield against the brisk winds that may send a shiver down your spine. Consider a brisk stroll through one of Boston’s quaint neighborhoods, perhaps to explore a local café for warmth and comfort in the form of a steaming cup of coffee. It is an ideal time to embrace the serene beauty of the city, where the simplicity of a walk can reveal the quiet charm that often goes unnoticed, deepening your connection to this storied landscape.
